user.title: Connect to Apple TV
user.description: Enter the IP address of your Apple TV. The integration will use it to control AirPlay speakers in its group.

pair_companion.title: Pair with {name} (Step 1/2)
pair_companion.description: A PIN code should appear on your Apple TV. Enter it below to pair the Companion protocol.

pair_airplay.title: Pair with {name} (Step 2/2)
pair_airplay.description: A new PIN code should appear on your Apple TV. Enter it below to pair the AirPlay protocol.

abort.already_configured: This Apple TV is already configured.

error.cannot_connect: Could not find an Apple TV at this address.
error.pairing_failed: Pairing failed. Check the PIN and try again.
